name: Guarana Myth
description:
In Guarana Myth, the player must journey in a perilous quest for the Guarana fruit. Limited to only choosing two options on every encounter you face, you must think ahead of time and be ready to know which of your resources to spend.

  • If you have no morale, you will be unable to make decisions.
  • If you have no food, you will start to lose life.
  • If you have no life, it is game over.
